name: RSandbox
description:
R Sandbox is a fascinating physical sandbox. In this game you can create anything you want. There are more than 1000 objects available that you can use in your buildings. You can create a car, plane, spacecraft, rocket, building. The game also has water physics, which allows you to create boats. The game has a multiplayer.
Cool friendly community in our Discord https://discord.gg/zqE5YYW.
Features:
Gameplay:
Unique gameplay.
Many unique maps.
Cool physics engine based on Nvidia Physics.
Play and create with your friends!
The game starts even on a potato phone. (joke)
A large number of tools to help you create buildings.

Customization:
Over 50 hats that will make your character unique.
Over 27 trails.
Over 10 player models.
